name: BNNSLayerParametersQuantization
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a quantization layer.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new quantization layer parameters structure.

items.name: init(axis_mask: Int, function: BNNSQuantizerFunction, i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, scale: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, bias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Returns a new quantization layer parameters structure using the supplied parameters.

items.name: var axis_mask: Int
items.desc: A bitmask that defines the axis to which the function applies scale and bias.
